frameDefinitions: A Resisting_entity is capable of resisting or does resist a physical Opposing_force to a level specified by the target.
An Object with an understood function is or is not in a state ready to perform that function.
A Cognizer retains facts in memory and is able to retrieve them.
Some Protection prevents a Danger from harming an Asset.
A particular Situation is likely (or unlikely) to result in a harmful event befalling an Asset.
An Asset is in a state where it is exposed to or otherwise liable to be affected by a Harmful_event, which may be metonymically evoked by reference to a Dangerous_entity.
frameExamples: The great and <t>impregnable</t> fortress still stands today.
I was impressed that she 'd actually <t>remembered</t> Radish 's name (= what Radish's name is)
The rubber on her sneakers <t>protected</t> her from the mud.
If you are a farmer, you are at <t>risk</t> for hearing loss caused by noise exposure in your work.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Resisting_entity</fen> is the item that resists the <fen>Opposing_force</fen> to the level specified by the target.

The <fen>Opposing_force</fen> is the item placed in opposition to the <fen>Resisting_entity</fen>. <fen>Opposing_force</fen> hinders, blocks, helps, or allows (lets) the <fen>Resisting_entity</fen> to resist at the level specified by the target. Sometimes this Core role is incorporated in the target; otherwise, it is often null instantiated in example sentences.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Resisting_entity</fen> resists an external force.
The location where the <fen>Resisting_entity</fen> resists an external force.
The entity with an understood purpose.
The person who retains and retrieves information.
<fen>Mental_content</fen> stored by and accessible to the <fen>Cognizer</fen>. It may derive from experience or activity or simply from being informed of it.
The time when the <fen>Cognizer</fen> retrieves <fen>Mental_content</fen> or forgets it.
The person, entity, or action that prevents harm to an <fen>Asset</fen>.
A situation that could damage the <fen>Asset</fen>.
Something desirable possessed by or directly associated with the <fen>Protection</fen> which might be lost or damaged.
The time when the <fen>Danger</fen> threatens.
The place where the <fen>Danger</fen> threatened the <fen>Asset</fen>.
The <fen>Situation</fen> which may lead to a harmful event.
Something judged to be desirable or valuable which might be lost or damaged.
A concrete or abstract entity which may come to cause the loss of, or damage to the Asset.
The time period during which the <fen>Situation</fen> has the specified level of safety.
A particular location for which the <fen>Situation</fen> is safe. Frequently, it is to be inferred that the characteristics of the location make various <fen>Situation</fen>s safe or unsafe.
Something judged to be desirable or valuable which might be lost or damaged.
An action that may occur or a state which may hold which could result in the loss of or damage to the <fen>Asset</fen>.
A concrete or abstract entity which may come to cause the loss of, or damage to the <fen>Asset</fen> either due to its participation in a <fen>Harmful_event</fen>.
The time period during which the <fen>Asset</fen> enjoys  the specified level of security from a <fen>Harmful_event</fen>.

A particular location in which the <fen>Asset</fen> is secure. Frequently, it is to be inferred that the characteristics of the location protect the <fen>Asset</fen> from a potential <fen>Harmful_event</fen>.
listRoleExamples: These are made from a tough <fex>plastic foam</fex> and are very light to wear.
The fortress was impregnable <fex>to attack by hostile invaders</fex>.
The retaining wall was even weaker <fex>yesterday</fex>, and had begun to crumble.
They decided the tree-house would be sturdiest <fex>in the big old backyard oak</fex>.
I bet <fex>Johno</fex> can remember the name of the Ramones' drummer.
Do you remember <fex>how to spell cupboard ?</fex>
<fex>Afterwards</fex>, I forgot what I was pissed off about, but I was.
<fex>The tabloid's deal with the woman</fex> shielded Schwarzenegger.

Other nations tended to muffle or modulate their occasional annoyance with the
country that was their shield <fex>against the Soviet threat</fex>.
Almost 10 years later, that agreement insulated <fex>Microsoft</fex> from liability on copyright claims over the graphical user interface (GUI).
Regardless of the distribution media, USPTO information is safeguarded <fex>before, during, and after dissemination</fex> from improper access and modification.
To make his way on a foreign soil, he needed different guardians from those that protected him <fex>in his own birthplace</fex> .
Most people agree, <fex>going over 100mph</fex> is unsafe.
Honey is not safe <fex>for babies</fex>.
<fex>That man</fex> is a risk!
There is a locked padlock that guarantees <fex>the information</fex> is secure.
Our system ensures that information stored within hardware is secure <fex>from external software attack and physical theft</fex>.
We make sure your BMW is secure <fex>against intruders</fex>.

Israel is insecure <fex>today</fex> not because it does
not have enough military power.
Workers need to make sure their property is secure <fex>at work</fex>.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: the Public Works and Transportation Committee
